description:
Data loaded from the PanCancer Atlas initiative on the GDC in April 2018. Contains normalized and batch corrected data of protein concentration, generated using the reverse phase protein array (RPPA) platform.  

More details:  https://gdc.cancer.gov/about-data/publications/PanCan-CellOfOrigin, file:TCGA-RPPA-pancan-clean.txt. This table has been deprecated. It has been copied to isb-cgc-bq.pancancer_atlas.Original_TCGA_RPPA_pancan_clean.

fields.description: TCGA study abbreviation, eg LAML. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-tcga-users/tcga-code-tables/tcga-study-abbreviations
fields.name: Study

fields.description: Protein symbol and phosphorylation status (if applicable), eg P53, JNK_pT183Y185
fields.name: Protein

fields.description: Expression level of protein as measured by reverse-phase protein arrays (RPPAs).Examples: 0.204238725,-0.01826295
fields.name: Value
